sentences.cn: 哈佛大学神学院的毕业生

sentences.en: Ancient Egyptians believed in the divinity of the pharaohs.
sentences.cn: 古埃及人相信法老王是神的化身.

sentences.en: Do you know that Divinity wereand Mythology were written?
sentences.cn: 知否神性出自人口,神话出自人手?

sentences.en: Education: Should have Master of Divinity degree ( or equivalent )
sentences.cn: 44教育程度: 需要有道学硕士 ( 或同等 )?

sentences.en: Green food from nature is the protective divinity of people's health.
sentences.cn: 出于自然的绿色食品,是人体健康的保护神.

sentences.en: Mercury was the presiding divinity over commerce.
The body of Jonathan Swift , Doctor of Divinity, dean of this cathedral churcn, is bruied here.
sentences.cn: 三一学院博士 、 本堂堂长乔纳森·斯威夫特葬于此地.

sentences.en: The body of Jonathan Swift, Doctor of Divinity, dean of this cathedral church, is buried here.
sentences.cn: 三一学院博士 、 本堂堂长乔纳森?斯威夫特葬于此地.

sentences.en: The Divinity School at the University of Chicago has problems as well.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥大学神学院也有问题.

sentences.en: The pale lunar touches which make beauties of hags lent divinity to this face, already beautiful.
sentences.cn: 那种淡白的月光,本来能叫老丑的妇人变为美人,现在把这副原本就姣丽的面孔, 更映照得天神一般了.

sentences.en: There is an aura of divinity about him.
sentences.cn: 他有一股神圣不可侵犯的气息.

sentences.en: They were also given their own temple and patron divinity or hero, whose priests they elected.
sentences.cn: 各个德莫同样也有自己的神庙及守护神或英雄, 并选出侍奉他们的神职人员.

sentences.en: When Sattva grows in man, divinity radiates through him.
sentences.cn: 当人心中的纯净性增加, 他便散发出神圣的气质.

sentences.en: Where there is expansion, there is virtue, humanity and divinity.
sentences.cn: 有心灵扩展的地方, 就有美德 、 人性与神性.

sentences.en: Without entering into an abstruse point of divinity , one thing is plain.
sentences.cn: 且不谈深奥的教义, 有一点是明明白白的.
